name: Riccardo (PREDEV) *READ DESCRIPTION
description:
***READ DESCRIPTION***

Riccardo is a space mining simulator

Im releasing a very early version of the game to see if it intrests everyone

***CONTROLS/INSTRUCTIONS***

WS/^v move forward and backward

AD/<> Turn

LMB Shoot

F interact(Cursor must be above object)

The long ship (top left of map) is to sell your ore

***CONTENT***

Right now you can move around and shoot astroids to get ore and sell it for money, not much but its just a consept right now!
